/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the sun. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
